summary.Title: Plumber & Pipefitter for Køge
summary.Presentation:

JobPositionInformation.Purpose:
Sewer Pipe worker for the biggest construction Project in Køge!

We are looking all over Denmark for a long-term contracted job as a pipefitter / VVS / Plumbing , with the possibility of permanent employment.

NOTE: This job is for candidates who have EU residence, or a work permit for Denmark.

The job revolves around outdoor- and indoor work (Primarily indoor) like the title pinpoints-

The job tasks are as follows:

  • Pipe installation (Working in the ground)
  • quality assurance
  • Independent work
  • Indoor pipefitting
  • Installation of toilets, sinks, pipes. ( No dirty work all is brand new )

Experience within the field is major plus.

Education is even better, but not req. if you have solid experience.

Work hours are set from 07.00-15.00 (Friday ends 30 minutes before) (37 work hours a week)

Salary / Wage is based on your qualifications (We will pay handsomely)

MEGA FLEX A/S will handle all the practical paperwork and guarantee employment under good terms, as well as handle pension and holiday pay. In other words, all you need to focus on is delivering quality work at our partner.

Application:

Interested? If so, hit the “Ansøg/Apply” Button today, and create a profile in our system ASAP. We are having candidate interviews fluidly until the startup date. If you have any questions, feel free to call us at 70 22 09 57 between 09.00-14.00 Monday-Friday.
